TopicTitle: How do you fly straight using RCS

Articles.Content: I want to use the RCS as a way to move in space. I\'ve seen videos of people doing it but no matter what I try all I can do is spin. ???

Check your keybinds.

IJKL are for moving laterally, H and N are forward and backward.

Check your keybinds.

IJKL are for moving laterally, H and N are forward and backward.

IJKLHN are controls for RCS? I always though they shared WASDQE with the pod. THANKS!
WASDQE are also controls for the RCS . Rotation, translation. Six axes, baby, welcome to SPACE!

Well the translated controls are used for propulsion regardless of where your RCS thrusters are located. If placed properly on the bottom and top of your rocket, press J or L should scoot your to the right aor left, respectively.

It\'s moments like this when I am glad I joined the forum. I just discovered the right side of my keyboard!

Pete.
